sourcesContent:
import { element } from 'prop-types' import React from 'react' import { Container, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' export default function PokeInfo(props) { const flav = props.flavor_text[0].flavor_text // console.log(flav) var desc = 'https://api.funtranslations.com/translate/shakespeare.json?text=' + flav.flavor_text desc = desc.split('\n').join(' ') desc = desc.split(' ').join('%20') return (
{props.name}
Description:
{flav} ) }
